Description: Fragment of round handle from a Brindisi pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink; small mica; cream slip. Rectangular stamp with Latin inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie notes several such stamps in his Naukratis diary. Name, L. Lucius. P. Palazzo, Le anfore di Apani (Brindisi), Rome 2013, 58-61.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1267)
